Change Log
=========================

0.0.1 (10/08/2020)
-------------------------
- First Release


0.0.2 (10/10/2020)
-------------------------
- CDS spread calculator added. Some typos corrected.


0.0.3 (10/11/2020)
-------------------------
- Yield curve interpolation/extrapolation component was corrected.
- Binary CDS spread calculator added.
- Documentation updated
